The Facebook post contains a black: and-white image showing Leonardo DiCaprio standing next to a young man who resembles him.
The post: s caption is written in English and Filipino, claiming that the young man is DiCaprio's son and an exact copy of him.
The same image and claim have been share: 4. Reverse image searches on Google and Tineye traced the image back to two separate occasions, one in 1994 and another in 2009, where DiCaprio was photographed with different individuals, disproving the claim of him having a son.
